ModMetaData.name: Minerals_SK
ModMetaData.author: Zachary Foster
ModMetaData.description:
For RimWorld Hardcore SK v1.1
mod version 1.3.0
<size=24>Description</size>
This mod adds various mineral-related content.
See: https://github.com/zachary-foster/Minerals_SK for detailed documentation.
Also check out the following extension mods:
* MineralsCraft_SK: https://github.com/zachary-foster/MineralsCraft_SK * MineralsExtra_SK: https://github.com/zachary-foster/MineralsExtra_SK
